<!-- ABOUT THE PROJECT -->
## About The Project

![In-game screenshot](https://i.postimg.cc/pTD0ny2Y/b-title.png)

It's Halloween 1993 and you don't have a costume yet. There are monsters about and you need to solve where they're coming from by fighting and collecting candy along the way.

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

### Built With

GameMaker Studio is the program used. Sprites were made using Aseprite and music was made using Guitar Pro.

[![Made with GameMaker Studio](https://img.shields.io/badge/Made%20with-GameMaker_Studio-8cd248.svg?style=flat&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fpng%3Bbase64%%2Bbn6Onq6%2Bzt7vDx8vT4%2Bvv8%2Fi7vr7oAAADYSURBVHgBNdB3M8RgEIDxFyfndFE4Xqf308spTuH0EBLJq0TC8%2F0%2FhETs%2FvXM%2FGZ2dlbtv5vXilK2G4R17flXtvqfvhjcdnUGjN0A95bIBjA3AhwsATAvUHKJ9R1EvYvbOwGYDpFJ9maB9ayngJpAy0nZg6e2rAvXkNgihSP4mch74BsumkXqKYzn2Z%2FApSXQ%2FQlO8W9tA75Gj0siVWA1PwR2F1gRKDoQba4tdz6CXw756BKpAFCrAjMaOBRoOgeehyN4sFpvgUGRnkZoprfSh2qlhl7M2%2BkvvuY4s1%2FFgmwAAAAASUVORK5CYII%3D)](https://www.yoyogames.com/gamemaker)

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

<!-- GETTING STARTED -->
## Getting Started

### Windows
Download the self contained .exe file from the Releases page. Execute to run.

### Unix
No release has been made.

### Controls
Arrow keys to move and navigate menus, X for selecting menus, Z for going back or pulling up the menu.

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>

<!-- ROADMAP -->
## Roadmap

This project was built many years ago as a student project. Despite finishing the core game engine, I never finished all the content planned. Unfortunately I also forgot how most of the code works and it's currently abandoned with no plans to continue working on it.

<p align="right">(<a href="#readme-top">back to top</a>)</p>
